name: Street Dice
description:
You've played it in the streets, back alleys and friends houses. Now play Street Craps against players worldwide anytime with the Street Dice ™ app!

Compete against friends and top ranking players worldwide for bragging rights. Amass stacks of cash and use it to upgrade your dice and locations. Win your way to the top of the leaderboard.

Street Dice ™ uses the same rules as street craps. Place PASS and DON'T PASS bets and roll the realistic 3D dice to make your POINTS.

Download Street Dice ™ today!
